meaning_str.bing:
n. 聚集；募集；（常指同类的）收集物；一批物品
网络. 集合；托收；收藏

聚集；募集；（常指同类的）收集物；一批物品

收集；采集；聚集；收藏品；收集物；募捐；一堆（东西）；一批（物品）；一群（人）；系列时装；专辑；作品集；领取；收取；收账；收债；<英>（尤指牛津大学的）学院期初（或期末）考试

1.en: Three years later, Mr. Cui and his wife left the steel mill and exhumed the collection; the Beijing troupe's survivors reassembled.
1.cn: 三年后，崔永平和他的妻子离开炼钢厂并挖出藏品；北京皮影剧团幸存下来的人重聚一堂。

2.en: The thinness of the sketch in Figure 3 did not bring up the photo in the collection shown in Figure 4.
2.cn: 图3内的草图因为纤细致使没能带来图4所示的集合内的照片。

3.en: It would be very wrong to think of soils as just a collection of fine mineral particles.
3.cn: 这将是非常错误的土壤看作仅仅是罚款矿物颗粒的集合。

0.en: Okay, what is in here? Rocks? No-no, this is my collection of fossil samples. So, rocks.
0.cn: 里面是什么？石头吗？不，我收集的化石样本。就是石头嘛。

1.en: Let's make a collection of all the things we find. Yes, we'll put them in George's bucket.
1.cn: 我们把各自找到的东西都收集起来吧。好的，就放在乔治的水桶里面吧。

2.en: A nice, shiny dime to add to your collection.
2.cn: 给你的收藏中添一枚亮闪闪的硬币。

3.en: And my precious souvenir snow globe collection.
3.cn: 还有我全球的雪景水晶球。

4.en: I was trying to make arrowheads for my rock collection.
4.cn: 我想做一个箭头来作石头收藏品。

5.en: That is so sweet! But I prefer the gold collection, but thank you.
5.cn: 真好，但我更想要金饰，还是要谢谢你。

6.en: I was chasing a rare Achemon Sphinx Moth for my collection. I have one.
6.cn: 当时为了我的标本收藏在追一只稀有的葡萄蔓天蛾。我有一只哦。

7.en: Oh, well, then we'll probably need to talk about your stuffed bear collection.
7.cn: 那么我还想谈谈你的毛毛熊收藏。

8.en: Ooh, tell her cute dress, Nanette Lepore, fall collection. Great. I'll open with cute dress.
8.cn: 告诉她裙子很可爱，公主娜娜的秋装好极了。我就用"可爱的裙子"开场。

9.en: Why Larry? did Larry call dibs? Will you forget dibs? He offered me a fair price for the whole collection.
9.cn: 为什么是拉里？拉里有权要求了？你能不能别提有权要求了？就这整套东西他提了个合理的价钱。

10.en: A story that's not just a collection of titles and positions, but a story that is really about your purpose.
10.cn: 不仅要陈述心中的头衔与职位，也要说出做出这些目标的因由。

11.en: You got a little boy. He shows you his butterfly collection, plus the killing jar. I'd take him to the doctor.
11.cn: 你的孩子展示了他的蝴蝶标本，还有他杀蝴蝶时的场景。我带他去看医生。

12.en: Oh, you and your ways. Since it's Christmas time. I'm going to be one of those people collection donations. Oh.
12.cn: 你的笑话真冷，圣诞节快到了，我要负责去募捐。

13.en: And you're also blithely unaware of the fact that in 2002, Oscar de la Renta did a collection of cerulean gowns.
13.cn: 你还轻率地忽视很多事情，像奥斯卡·德拉伦塔在2002年，设计过一系列天蓝色的晚礼服。

14.en: No, I mean gravity. History class is not about poetry. Names and dates. History is a collection of names and dates.
14.cn: 不，我说的就是重力。历史课不是讲诗歌的。是讲名字和日期的。

15.en: Oh, I call dibs on the golden age flash. Hang on. I need that to complete my justice society of America collection.
15.cn: 我有权要求那"Golden Age Flash"(一部漫画)。等等，我要靠它来集全"正义联盟"(一部漫画)。

16.en: But be warned, this collection of priceless artworks and antiquities is simply too vast to explore in just one day.
16.cn: 但请注意，这里收藏太多珍贵的艺术品和骨董馆藏，不可能在短短一天就全部看完。

17.en: Not far from the Musee du Louvre stands the Centre Pompidou, displaying the largest collection of modern art in Europe.
17.cn: 距离卢浮宫不远的庞毕度中心，展示全欧洲馆藏数量最多的现代艺术作品。

18.en: Well, I called dibs at the Christmas party when Professor Rothman tried to have intercourse with the Toys for Tots collection box.
18.cn: 早在圣诞节派对上罗斯曼教授试图跟玩具盒里的公仔做爱时，我就说了这里归我了。

19.en: I don't know. If we're going to start a fantasy sword collection and I've long thought we should is this really the sword to start with?
19.cn: 不知道。如果我们要开始收藏奇幻剧中的刀剑，虽然我很久前就认为应该收藏，但真的要从这把开始吗？
